main.title: Schips
main.description: Experience these highly addictive potato chips

intro.title: Schips - highly addictive potato chips
intro.description:
Schips is an idea a friend and I came up with on a party. Everywhere you looked where these blend, generic potato chips that taste like card board. What if we could provide great tasting, highly addictive chips that use the freshest locally sourced ingredients?

As it is with many party ideas, Schips remains to be an idea that will never come to life. Anyways, I created a few designs to showcase Schips. Check them out below.
